comment: I am seeing lots of powerful Jewish oligarchs chirping about the Proud Boys. In other words, an FBI raid is imminent. Gavin will be pressured to disband the proud boys, or he could choose to fight, but he will be dealing with ZOG for the first time in his life. They know the PBs aren't criminals, but the FBI is just the American KGB: political police.

                  :ARG2 (o4 / or

                                    :ARG0-of (p4 / pride-01)))

            :ARG2 (d2 / deal-01

                  :ord (o6 / ordinal-entity

      :snt4 (c3 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (k / know-01
